services.heading: Web Development
services.text1: Mechanical CAD Drafting Services provides technical drawings from the CAD Software that tells about how a mechanism is assembled and how it will function for part, component, or product modeling
services.text: We provide all types of web-based software and ensure great experience for web users. At CodySupra Techies we professionally design, develop and provide high quality user experience to all our customers to achieve high conversion and adoption rates.
services.longDesc: Our CAD experts and industrial design engineers deliver comprehensive CAD drafting with detailed engineering specifications to develop ideas into products. From CAD modeling to proof of design concepts with FEA and CFD simulations and final shop drawings, our teams deliver onsite and offsite models as per industry standards and design guidelines of DFMA, ASME, BS etc.

services.heading: Hosting Services
services.text: We provide customized hosting services tailored for your business. We deliver the complete package of speed, security, versatility, and most importantly, superb reliability. As your website grows, get the scalability and features you need to keep pace with your success.
services.text1: Structural design is the a investigation of the stability, strength and rigidity of structures. The basic objective in structural design is to produce a structure capable of resisting all loads without failure during its intended life
services.longDesc: Our structural design teams have an extensive experience in developing structural drawings and models for various structural elements to develop reliable structures of concrete, steel, wood and fiberglass. We have expertise in preparing a structured problem solving approach using STADDPro for complex structural geometry, steel detailing and analysis and help builders construct seamlessly.

benefits.title: Expertise in assisting companies for structural 3D modeling and drafting
list: Structural shades for parking and canteen areas
Industrial structural shades and workshop area

services.heading: Cloud Solutions
services.text: Accelerate business agility and growth—continuously modernize your apps on any platform using a hybrid cloud approach. We work with you to determine the right cloud strategy, cloud solutions, operating model, combining our expertise with technology insights.
services.text1: Sheet Metal Design Services is made for the manufacturers to create actual objects such as HVAC systems, enclosures, signs, etc. which is compliant with the industry standard and improves the productivity of sheet designing.
services.longDesc: We develop detailed sheet metal shop drawings by considering the material type, finish, critical dimension, hardware and bought-out parts by considering building product manufacturer’s tooling capabilities

benefits.title: Benefits of custom sheet metal CAD drafting services
list: Custom drawings as per tooling capabilities
Direct delivery of drawings CNC shops
